column4: So, any suggestions on my workstation issue?  Trying to install Ubuntu on an HP xw 4600 Workstation but it locks up/freezes after login.
report a bug against this please
I will later today.  I guess this means there's no fix.
havent a clue tbh, have you goolgled around and searched on launchpad for a workaround? when is it failing, at what part?
